comments.body:
I think it's better to use `table: NamedRelation`, to be consistent with the existing commands like `DescribeTable`.

When we add `ResolveView` later, we would also use `view: NamedRelation`, as it can be temp views.
So we need to add support for v1 table to be converted to `NamedRelation`. https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/26847/files#diff-57b3d87be744b7d79a9beacf8e5e5eb2R883-R888
